overview: The movie is devided into 3 episodes, with different content and styles. The most interesting ones are: Delirio dellâ€™ anima and Adulterio al cinema (adultery in the cinema). The first one is a story about a married woman who reveals the misterious background of her marriage, and tells her psychologist all about it. The second one tells the story of the wifes of two officers, who decide to cheat on their husbands in a movie theater, located in the suburbs.
title: Salieri Erotic Stories 2
